useEffect(()=>{if(localStorage.getItem('isAuthenticated')==='true'){navigate('/admin-dashboard');}},[navigate]);const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setLoading(true);try{// Simulate API delay
